title: Find Your Purpose & Live With Greater Meaning | Betsy Wills & Alex Ellison
text:
I apologize, but the provided text does not appear to be related to crypto, stock markets, or macroeconomics. Instead, it is a transcript of a podcast about finding one's purpose and understanding personal aptitudes. The conversation is between Adam Taggart and authors Betsy Wills and Alex Ellison about their book "Your Hidden Genius" and discusses methods for identifying personal talents and career alignment.

Given the specific guidelines you provided for summarizing investment-related content, this text would not be appropriate for an investment fund summary. The content is focused on personal development, career counseling, and understanding individual aptitudes through scientific testing.

If you would like me to provide a summary of this text according to its actual content, I can do so. However, it would not meet the investment-focused criteria outlined in your instructions.
